titles.title: Red River Designation Act of 1993
Red River Designation Act of 1993
Red River Designation Act of 1993
To amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate certain segments of the Red River in Kentucky as components of the national wild and scenic rivers system, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E330-331)
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended).
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 103-281.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 154.

action.text: Mr. Vento moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 292.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote. (consideration: CR 11/18/1993 S16188)

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
By Senator Johnston from Committee on Energy and Natural Resources filed written report. Report No. 103-206.

bill.summary: 10/18/1993--Passed House amended. Red River Designation Act of 1993 - Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate specified segments of the Red River in Kentucky as components of the national wild and scenic rivers system. Specifies that nothing in this Act shall be construed as authorizing any acquisition of any scenic easement that without the consent of such landowner would affect any regular use of relevant lands.
